original_text: But the Lord said unto him, Go thy way: for he is a chosen vessel unto me, to bear my name before the Gentiles, and kings, and the children of Israel:
korean_text: 주께서 이르시되 가라 이 사람은 내 이름을 이방인과 임금들과 이스라엘 자손들에게 전하기 위하여 택한 나의 그릇이라

sentences.original_text: But the Lord said unto him
for he is a chosen vessel unto me,
before Gentiles, and kings, and children of Israel:
